channel.title: [317] PI Pk Forever Release
channel.description:
**there are some bugs u will need to fix** creds 10% insidiax for base 90% me for coding/adding stuff in This is my first server Dont hate.. Im Blade
things i added/changed-
- nex - fixed up combat - teletabs (they didnt work before) - picking flax now works type ::flax to get there - changed donorshops - flower minigame - lotto game gotta press trade to play - added donor capes green one gives 2x exp and red one that gives 4x exp - lots of commands - bone crusher - omg noted rocktails that unnote in bank O.O - fixed up thieving - made farming better - changed pkp shops - money pouch with dupe fixed - working display names!! - loads more cant remember look for yourself
Pics!! the best part:

item.title: [317] PI Pk Forever Release
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

90% credits to you

You should probably change that to read “5% credits to me for following copy/paste tutorials and making the client look god-awful”.

I’m sorry, but this is not a good release at all, you didn’t do anything. There’s nothing special that stands out or catches my attention at all.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] PI Pk Forever Release
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

Eeeewwwww. The stuff you listed is simple shit. The only thing you really did was change the sprites.

[quote=“hunter156, post:1, topic:450333”]things i added/changed-

  • nex
  • fixed up combat
  • teletabs (they didnt work before)
  • picking flax now works type ::flax to get there
  • changed donorshops
  • flower minigame
  • lotto game gotta press trade to play
  • added donor capes green one gives 2x exp and red one that gives 4x exp
  • lots of commands
  • bone crusher
  • omg noted rocktails that unnote in bank O.O
  • fixed up thieving
  • made farming better
  • changed pkp shops
  • money pouch with dupe fixed
  • working display names!![/quote]

There’s a Nex tutorial somewhere on Rune-Server. I doubt you fixed up combat. Teletabs are simple, there’s even a tutorial released. Flax is just adding a clickobject to put shit in your inventory. A shop really shouldn’t even be listed… etc.

But, as long as you’ve learned something, it shouldn’t matter.

Read full topic
